mail.title: Mail Classifier
mail.subtitle: AI Document Analysis
mail.instruction: Photograph the document for content analysis.
mail.danger_desc: Appears to be important documents such as taxes, fines, etc.
mail.safe_desc: Appears to be a general guide or promotional material. No need to worry.

pension.title: National Pension Lump-sum Refund
pension.eligible_agreement: {{country}} is a signatory country to the social security agreement.
pension.eligible_conditional_met: You may qualify for payment if you meet the residency period requirement.
pension.ineligible_conditional_fail: Does not meet the residency period requirement (at least 1 year).
pension.ineligible_country: {{country}} nationality is generally not eligible for payment.
pension.disclaimer_text: The above results are approximate estimates, and actual eligibility and amounts may differ. Please verify with official authorities.
pension.disclaimer_contact: Inquiry: National Pension Service 1355 (no area code) / www.nps.or.kr

steps.prep_item_2: Flight Ticket (e-ticket) - within 1 month of departure
steps.prep_item_3: Copy of Bank Account in Your Name (Domestic or Overseas)
steps.airport_item_1: Visit the jurisdictional branch of the National Pension Service before departure to apply for 'Airport Payment'
steps.airport_item_2: Receive 'Payment Instruction' at Incheon Airport National Pension Consultation Center
steps.airport_item_3: Exchange currency at Woori Bank Exchange at the departure hall
steps.airport_item_4: Receivable Currency: USD, EUR, JPY, etc. (KRW not available)
steps.overseas_item_2: Copy of Overseas Bank Account in Your Name
steps.overseas_item_3: Copy of Passport and Overseas Immigration Report (for Residents)

login.createAccountError: Failed to create account. Please try again.
login.verifyEmailBody: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
login.emailInUse: This email is already registered. Please log in.
login.linkSentDesc: Registration completed. Please verify your email to complete the process.
login.notVerifiedYet: Not yet verified. Please check your inbox.

dashboard.safe_desc: Appears to be a general guide or promotional material. No need to worry.

aiChat.title: AI Consultation
aiChat.subtitle: Ask Anything
aiChat.welcomeMessage: Hello! Do you have any questions about living in Korea or your visa?
aiChat.fetchError: Unable to retrieve AI response. Please try again later.
aiChat.responseError: Sorry, an error occurred and we cannot provide a response.
aiChat.disclaimer: The AI response may not be accurate. Please verify important information with official sources.
aiChat.systemPrompt: You are an AI assistant helping foreigners living in Korea. Provide accurate and friendly answers regarding visas (especially F-5, F-2), immigration policies, and living in Korea. This is not legal advice, and for important issues, guide them to verify with HiKorea or an expert. Always respond in this language:

agency.title: Find Government Services
agency.subtitle: Search for government agencies by address

description.immigration: Handles foreigner registration, ARC issuance, visa extensions and changes, and residence permits.
description.community: Provides residence address change notifications, certificate issuance, seal registration, and civil services.
description.global: Offers multilingual consultation, legal support, employment assistance, and startup programs for foreigners.
description.multicultural: Provides Korean language education, interpretation services, child education support, and employment connections.
description.worker: Offers labor consultation, living support, legal counseling, and emergency assistance for foreign workers.

visaDocs.notice: The list below provides general documentation requirements, and additional documents may be requested by the jurisdictional immigration office depending on individual circumstances. (Administrative Scrivener Act Compliance)

f5.residence3years: Residence in Korea for at least 3 years
f5.kiip5: Completed Level 5 of Korea Immigration and Integration Program
f5.eligibleDesc: You may have a high possibility of meeting F-5-10 permanent residency application conditions.
f5.ineligibleDesc: Some of the essential conditions are not met, or income/points are insufficient.

visaStatus.infoDesc: The above information is stored only within the app's repository and is not transmitted externally. Please verify with HiKorea for accurate information as it may differ from the actual residence period.

tax.title: Year-End Settlement Guide
tax.subtitle: The 13th Month's Salary
tax.whatIsItDesc: It is commonly referred to as the <bold>13th month's salary</bold>. It's the process of recalculating taxes paid over the past year to refund any overpaid amounts and collect any underpaid amounts.
tax.timeline_1_desc: Download the data from Home Tax.
tax.timeline_2_desc: Submit relevant documents to the company.
tax.timeline_3_desc: Verify refund amount from the payslip.
tax.doc_2: Credit Card / Cash Receipts Deduction Details
tax.actionBtn: Go to National Tax Service HomTax
